name: Slide Hockey
description:
Slide Hockey is a simplified hockey game that you can play against the phone or a friend. Against the phone, the Pro mode scores regularly and zeroes in on the net. Score a goal by landing directly in the opposing net, and earn a point. When you reach the goal line, but do not make it to the net, the game will give a "No Goal" message.

If you delay the game by waiting longer than 10 seconds to make a move, you get a penalty. When you get 3 penalties, your opponent is awarded 1 point.
